title: A False Charity
description: A deliciously quirky cozy mystery full of twists and turns.Meet sixty-something widow Bea Abbot. She lost her husband but now she’s found a new lease of life — solving crimes.Bea Abbot comes home from New Zealand to start a new life after the loss of her beloved husband, Hamilton. But her problems have only just begun. Her son is pressuring her to sell her house, her business isn’t doing well, she has two unexpected lodgers — and her daughter-in-law’s spoiled little Yorkie to deal with.But Bea is persuaded by an old friend to take on one last job. Coral is owed a lot of money by the charity which hired her to cater two swanky parties.Bea discovers there are far more sinister goings-on than bouncing cheques. A missing barman for example . . . who may have come to a very sticky end.
author: Veronica Heley
